MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult<Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Memory.IHandleDataSource> UseHandles (this Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource trace);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult`1<class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Memory.IHandleDataSource> UseHandles(class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource trace) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function UseHandles (trace As ITraceSource) As IPendingResult(Of IHandleDataSource)
static member UseHandles : Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource -> Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult<Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Memory.IHandleDataSource>

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides partial data from a trace about active kernel handles.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides partial data from the trace about active kernel handles.

remarks.para: This data source is not complete.
Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data via the Handles table.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult<Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Memory.IHardFaultDataSource> UseHardFaults (this Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource trace);

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides data from a trace about hard page faults.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data from the trace about hard page faults.
Docs.remarks: Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data via the Hard Faults table.

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides data from a trace about process heap usage.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data from the trace about process heap usage.
Docs.remarks: Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data via the Heap Snapshot table.

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides data from a trace about total system memory utilization.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data from the trace about total system memory utilization.
Docs.remarks: Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data via the Memory Utilization table.

Docs.summary: Provides data from a trace about kernel pool memory usage.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data from the trace about kernel pool memory usage.

static member UseReferenceSetData : Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource -> Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult<Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Memory.IReferenceSetDataSource>

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides data from a trace about pages of virtual memory used by each process.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data from the trace about pages of virtual memory used by each process.
Docs.remarks: Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data via the Reference Set table.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult<Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Memory.IResidentSetDataSource> UseResidentSetData (this Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource trace);

static member UseResidentSetData : Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource -> Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult<Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Memory.IResidentSetDataSource>

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides data from a trace about the pages of virtual memory for each process that were resident in physical memory.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data from the trace about pages of virtual memory for each process that were resident in physical memory.
Docs.remarks: Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data via the Resident Set table.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult<Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Memory.IWorkingSetDataSource> UseWorkingSetData (this Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource trace);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult`1<class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Memory.IWorkingSetDataSource> UseWorkingSetData(class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource trace) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function UseWorkingSetData (trace As ITraceSource) As IPendingResult(Of IWorkingSetDataSource)
static member UseWorkingSetData : Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource -> Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult<Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Memory.IWorkingSetDataSource>

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides data from a trace about pages of virtual memory that were in the working set for each process or kernel category.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data from the trace about the pages of virtual memory that were in the working set for each process or kernel category.
Docs.remarks: Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data via the Virtual Memory Snapshots table.
